name: The Station (itch) (ddoRotolo)
description:
A Short Space Adventure created for the 2018 GMTK Game Jam. Idea was to make a space adventure without pointing and clicking, instead "grasping around" to see the environment, as a blind protagonist.

Currently is deeply unfinished and essentially a tech demo. There is currently nothing to interact with past the intro screen.

Pixel Art by the amazing lubbocklight
